name: Deep Dark L♂byrinth
description:
Genres: Visual Novel, Parody, Horror, Mystery, Psychological.

(&#*^@ is obsessed with computer games. After a long, agonizing wait, he finally purchases a long-awaited game called "&$$*#)*&@^$!*@#^*".
Everything was prepared for the complete immersion into the game, but suddenly everything around becomes blurry and hazy. Slowly he sinks into total darkness.
At the very same moment, as if from a long sleep, a voice comes out of nowhere waking him up to reality.
When he opens his eyes, he realizes, with horror, that he's no longer in his room but on an island that he has just seen on the screen.
He has become the main character of the computer game.

Will he be able to distinguish reality from fiction? How real is the reality around him?* Full HD 1080p
